name: Girl Group Leader Lyrica's Brothel Management
name_original: Girl Group Leader Lyrica's Brothel Management
description:
◆ Story
The main character, Lyrica, was an ordinary student.
--Until a few weeks ago.

Due to the sudden death of his father, the leader of the gangster "Mata Tabi-gumi"
It was decided to take over the trace in a hurry.

Harassment from a yakuza man who has no time to mourn and is also a spectator
Quota of payment to be lent ……
Various trials attack Lyrica.

In order to deal with them, Lyrica chose to shoot an AV and run a brothel to make an actress prostitute.

Shave off and eat the weak ...
In such a world behind the scenes, I photographed the foolery of unhappy daughters, made them prostitute, and paid the upper payment!

-Is it glory or ruin beyond that?

◆ Overview
・ The stage is a brothel in the back world.
Make money by AV shooting & prostitution by taking advantage of the weaknesses of unhappy women!

・ Regular quotas are imposed from above.
If you can't do it, a tough Oshioki will be waiting for you!

・ If you continue to pay the upper payment, you may be promoted to the group.
Aim for the rise!

・ How many heroines should be killed, what kind of shooting and prostitution should be done
It's up to you, the player!

  • Multiple characters from previous works will appear, but the parallel world of the corresponding work,
    Or it is the world after the bad end route.
    You can enjoy this work alone.
